class.name: Loot
class.brief_description: Resource containing a list of loot items with independent chance-based random generation.
class.description:
The Loot resource represents a loot table containing a list of [LootItem] resources. It provides functionality for chance-based random selection of items, similar to the Minetest loot system, commonly used in survival games for treasure chests, enemy drops, and resource gathering. Each item has an independent probability of being selected during random generation.
Unlike weight-based systems, each loot item has an independent chance (0.0 to 1.0) of being selected, allowing for more predictable probability calculations.

method.name: get_random_item
method.description: Returns a randomly selected [LootItem] from the loot table based on independent chance probabilities. Each item is checked independently against its chance value (0.0 to 1.0). Returns null if no items pass their chance checks or if the loot table is empty.

members.member: Array of [LootItem] resources that define what items can be generated and their independent probabilities. Each loot item contains an item ID, chance for probability calculation (0.0 to 1.0), and minimum/maximum amount ranges.
Optional name for this loot table, useful for identification and organization in the inventory database.
